settings.title: Maxem user account
settings.subtitle: Enter your Maxem user account. The app will use this account to communicate with Maxem.

start.title: Add Maxem Smart Energy
start.intro: If a valid account is configured in the app settings sections of Homey, the Maxem box will be listed.

messages.errorNoUsername: No username configured in the app settings section.
messages.errorNoPassword: No password configured in the app settings section
messages.errorInvalidSettings: Invalid account configured in the app settings sections.
